sub_categories.name: Civil Engineering
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Tech/B.E. in Civil Engineering
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Focus on understanding structural concepts and practical applications. Internships in construction companies will give you hands-on experience.

sub_categories.name: Mechanical Engineering
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Tech/B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Get familiar with CAD software, thermodynamics, and fluid mechanics. Internships in manufacturing or automobile companies will help.

sub_categories.name: Doctor (MBBS)
sub_categories.qualification_required: MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-1 years for internships; 5+ years for specialization
sub_categories.tips: Focus on theoretical knowledge, clinical skills, and patient care. Specializing in areas like surgery, pediatrics, or internal medicine opens more career doors.

sub_categories.name: Dentist (BDS)
sub_categories.qualification_required: BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for specialized practice
sub_categories.tips: Study oral anatomy, preventive care, and cosmetic dentistry. Internships and clinical practice will sharpen your skills.

sub_categories.name: Fine Arts (Painting, Sculpture, etc.)
sub_categories.qualification_required: BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts), MFA (Master of Fine Arts)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Build a portfolio of your work. Participate in exhibitions, workshops, and competitions to enhance your exposure and experience.

sub_categories.name: Literature/Creative Writing
sub_categories.qualification_required: BA in English, MA in Literature/Creative Writing
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for established writers
sub_categories.competitive_exams_needed: Entrance exams for writing programs or publishing roles
sub_categories.tips: Read extensively and write regularly. Building an online presence and publishing articles, blogs, or short stories will help you get noticed.

sub_categories.name: Chartered Accountant (CA)
sub_categories.qualification_required: CA course, including CPT, IPCC, and Final Exam
sub_categories.experience_required: 2-3 years of Articleship under a CA firm
sub_categories.competitive_exams_needed: CA Foundation, CA Intermediate, CA Final
sub_categories.tips: Be prepared for long hours of study and practical training. A good understanding of accounting principles and tax laws is key.

sub_categories.name: Investment Banker
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Com, MBA in Finance or related field
sub_categories.experience_required: 1-3 years for associate roles; 5+ years for senior investment bankers
sub_categories.tips: Develop strong financial analysis skills, keep up with market trends, and gain experience through internships at financial firms.

sub_categories.name: Lawyer (LLB)
sub_categories.qualification_required: LLB (Bachelor of Laws)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Develop strong research and communication skills. Internships and moot court participation will help improve practical skills.

sub_categories.name: Corporate Law
sub_categories.qualification_required: LLB, LLM in Corporate Law
sub_categories.experience_required: 2-5 years for mid-level roles; 5+ years for senior corporate lawyers
sub_categories.tips: Learn contract law and business regulations. Interning at a corporate law firm can provide exposure to mergers and acquisitions.

sub_categories.name: Social Work
sub_categories.qualification_required: BA in Social Work, MSW (Master of Social Work)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Focus on communication and counseling skills. Volunteering in NGOs can give you practical exposure.

sub_categories.name: Counseling
sub_categories.qualification_required: BA/BSc in Psychology, MA/MSc in Counseling or Clinical Psychology
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for specialized therapists
sub_categories.tips: Develop strong interpersonal skills and empathy. Gaining clinical experience through internships will refine your practice.

sub_categories.name: Physics
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Sc., M.Sc. in Physics
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level research positions; 5+ years for advanced roles
sub_categories.tips: Focus on building strong theoretical knowledge and mathematical skills. Joining research projects can accelerate your learning.

sub_categories.name: Biology
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Sc., M.Sc. in Biology, Ph.D. (optional for research roles)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior research positions
sub_categories.tips: Stay updated on developments in genetics, biotechnology, and environmental biology. Interning at research labs will provide useful experience.

sub_categories.name: Film & Television
sub_categories.qualification_required: BA in Film Studies, MA in Film Direction
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Work on short films and documentaries to build your portfolio. Participating in film festivals helps in networking.

sub_categories.name: Graphic Design
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Des in Graphic Design
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior design roles
sub_categories.tips: Master design software like Adobe Creative Suite. Building a strong portfolio of your work is key to landing a good job.

sub_categories.name: Teacher (Various Subjects)
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Ed (Bachelor of Education), specific subject degree (e.g., M.Sc. for Science subjects)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior positions
sub_categories.tips: Stay updated on teaching methodologies. Gaining experience in tutoring and volunteering in schools will build your teaching skills.

sub_categories.name: Educational Consultant
sub_categories.qualification_required: M.Ed (Master of Education), Educational Psychology
sub_categories.experience_required: 2-5 years for consulting roles
sub_categories.competitive_exams_needed: No specific exams, but certification in educational consultancy may help
sub_categories.tips: Develop expertise in curriculum design and educational technology. Consulting for schools and universities will enhance your experience.

sub_categories.name: Electrician
sub_categories.qualification_required: Diploma/ITI in Electrical Engineering
sub_categories.experience_required: 1-3 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.competitive_exams_needed: No exams required but licensing may be needed
sub_categories.tips: Practical training is key. Completing an apprenticeship will give you hands-on experience.

sub_categories.name: Plumber
sub_categories.qualification_required: ITI/Diploma in Plumbing
sub_categories.experience_required: 1-2 years for entry-level positions; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Develop your practical skills and stay updated on industry standards. An apprenticeship is highly beneficial.

sub_categories.name: Army Officer
sub_categories.qualification_required: Graduation, NDA (National Defence Academy) entrance exam
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level roles
sub_categories.tips: Prepare physically and mentally. Strong leadership and problem-solving skills are vital for this role.

sub_categories.name: Air Force Pilot
sub_categories.qualification_required: Graduation, AFCAT (Air Force Common Admission Test)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level roles
sub_categories.tips: Prepare for rigorous training and physical fitness. Understand aviation technology and military tactics.

sub_categories.name: Athlete
sub_categories.qualification_required: No specific qualification, but physical fitness and training are essential
sub_categories.experience_required: Varies, from 1 year for entry-level to professional status over time
sub_categories.tips: Consistent training, discipline, and nutrition are key. Pursuing a career in sports requires full commitment.

sub_categories.name: Fitness Trainer
sub_categories.qualification_required: Certification in Fitness Training (e.g., ACE, ISSA)
sub_categories.experience_required: 1-2 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior positions
sub_categories.competitive_exams_needed: No exams, but certifications are essential
sub_categories.tips: Develop expertise in exercise physiology and diet planning. Internships in fitness centers or gyms will provide hands-on experience.

sub_categories.name: Environmental Scientist
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Sc. Environmental Science, M.Sc. in Environmental Studies
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-3 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior roles
sub_categories.tips: Stay updated on environmental policies and sustainable practices. Gaining practical experience in environmental labs or NGOs will help.

sub_categories.name: Sustainability Consultant
sub_categories.qualification_required: MBA in Sustainability, B.Tech in Environmental Engineering
sub_categories.experience_required: 2-5 years for consulting roles
sub_categories.competitive_exams_needed: No specific exams, but certifications in sustainability practices are helpful
sub_categories.tips: Develop expertise in green technologies and eco-friendly solutions. Work with companies to design sustainable strategies.

sub_categories.name: Astronomy
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Sc., M.Sc. in Astronomy, Ph.D. (optional for research roles)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level research positions
sub_categories.tips: Join observatories and research institutions to build practical experience. Collaborate with other researchers in your field.

sub_categories.name: Space Research
sub_categories.qualification_required: B.Tech in Aerospace Engineering, M.Tech, Ph.D. (optional for advanced research)
sub_categories.experience_required: 0-2 years for entry-level roles; 5+ years for senior researchers
sub_categories.tips: Focus on mastering aerodynamics and space systems. Internships at agencies like NASA or ISRO provide practical learning.
